description: Number of unitary and squarefree divisors of C(n,[n/2]). Also the number of divisors of special squarefree part of A001405(n), A0560600(n).
example: n=14, C(15,7)=3432=2.2.2.3.11.13, it has 32 divisors, 16 unitary and 16 squarefree divisors. Only 6 ones belong to both classes: {1,3,11,13,33,39,143,429}, so a(14)=8.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Aug 10 2000
